value.name: Lawsuit Alleges Daunte Wright Shot Teen In Head In 2019, Causing ‘Serious, Disabling And Permanent Injuries’
value.description: A mother is suing the estate of Daunte Wright, alleging the young man killed by Brooklyn Center police last month shot her teenage son in the head two years ago, causing “serious, disabling, and permanent injuries.

video.name: Lawsuit Alleges Daunte Wright Shot Teen In Head In 2019, Causing ‘Serious, Disabling And Permanent Injuries’

value.name: Lawsuit claims Daunte Wright shot, permanently disabled teen in 2019
value.description: The mother of a teenager filed a lawsuit Friday seeking damages from the estate of Daunte Wright, claiming that Wright, who was killed by a Brooklyn Center police officer April 11, shot her son in the head at a north Minneapolis gas station in 2019,

value.name: Daunte Wright’s Estate Sues By Family Of Shooting Victim
value.description: A mother alleges her teenage son was shot in the head two years ago by Daunte Wright, the young man killed last month by Brooklyn Center police (0:31). WCCO 4 News At 10 - May 28, 2021

video.name: Daunte Wright’s Estate Sues By Family Of Shooting Victim

value.name: KARE 11 Investigates: Lawsuit claims Daunte Wright shot a teenager in the head
value.description: Two years before he was shot and killed by a Brooklyn Center police officer, a lawsuit claims there’s evidence Daunte Wright shot a 16-year-old boy.

value.name: Prosecutor assigned to case of ex-cop charged in Daunte Wright's death resigns over 'vitriol' and 'partisan politics'
value.description: Imran Ali resigned days after the Washington County attorney's office asked another prosecutor to pursue the case against Kim Potter.

video.name: 'Never going to be justice for us': Daunte Wright's mother makes emotional plea

value.name: Prosecutor on Daunte Wright's death case resigns, citing 'vitriol'
value.description: A prosecutor who was co-counsel in the case against a former suburban Minneapolis police officer charged in the fatal shooting of Daunte Wright resigned Monday, saying "vitriol" and "partisan politics" have made it hard to pursue justice.

value.name: Death of Daunte Wright
value.description: News from The Associated Press, the definitive source for independent journalism from every corner of the globe.

value.name: Minn. Prosecutor Previously In Charge Of Daunte Wright Case Resigns Over ‘Partisan Politics’
value.description: Imran Ali, one of Washington County’s top prosecutors, said “vitriol” and “partisan politics” have made it “difficult to pursue justice.”

value.name: Minnesota prosecutor on Daunte Wright police shooting case resigns over 'vitriol' and 'partisan politics'
value.description: "I pray that our state heals and the extreme partisan platforms dissipate," prosecutor Imran Ali said in a resignation letter.

video.name: Minnesota prosecutor on Daunte Wright police shooting case resigns over 'vitriol' and 'partisan politics'

value.name: Minnesota AG Keith Ellison to lead case against officer who fatally shot Daunte Wright
value.description: Minnesota Attorney General Keith Ellison will lead the prosecution of the former police officer Kim Potter accused of killing Daunte Wright during a traffic stop.
